name: Task Update
query:
SELECT
    task.name AS "Task ID:Link/Task:150",
    task.type AS "Task Type:Data:120",
    task.custom_customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    task.subject AS "Subject:Data:200",
    task.status AS "Status:Data:100",
    task.creation AS "Created On:Datetime:150",
    task.completed_on AS "Completed On:Datetime:150",
    task.custom_owner AS "Owner (Email):Link/User:180",
    task.priority AS "Priority:Data:100",
    task.department AS "Department:Link/Department:150",

    GROUP_CONCAT(circuit.circuit_id SEPARATOR ', ')
        AS "Circuit IDs:Data:300"

FROM
    `tabTask` task

INNER JOIN
    `tabHD Agent` agent
        ON task.custom_owner = agent.name

LEFT JOIN
    `tabTask Circuit ID` circuit
        ON circuit.parent = task.name
        AND circuit.parenttype = 'Task'

GROUP BY
    task.name

ORDER BY
    task.creation DESC;
